attributes.action: It is vital to shutdown schools again as COVID cases are dramatically increasing
attributes.additional_details: People are dying everyday and students can play a vital role to avoid further deaths by staying home and do online without the spreading the virus to those who are vulnerable such as the elderly and those with a serious or highlighted medical condition.
attributes.background: I believe online learning should take place again until COVID19 no longer exists as covid is widely spreading with 22,653 positive in one day as of 7/10/20
